description:
In my banking online web page when trying to do a transfer it is annoying that it states enter correct date format, even when picking it from the date picker:

NA/NA/NANA

that is how it is formatted in Epiphany :( , firefox works fine.
summary: Runs great mostly but date fields are incorrectly formatted

description: Despite the webkit base, I see no tracking protection like in Safari. No tracking protection or standards like Firefox. But if you need something barebones this will work. I prefer Firefox, though.
It so usefull, now i can develop web that has webkit engine
Love this Browser and especially since I discovered Technology Preview!! all the sites I visit are stable. So lightweight and works... My 2 favorite words towards browsing!
